content:
I see you're really excited about trying out this recipe! I'm happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Remember, the key to a great Penne alla Vodka is to not be afraid to experiment and adjust the flavors to your liking. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more assistance or guidance.

Now, go ahead and get cooking! I hope your Penne alla Vodka turns out delicious, and I'm sure the addition of grilled chicken will make it even more satisfying.
